general information: Marketing Information The 22" NEC MultiSync E223W delivers the latest in display technologies, while providing many eco-friendly benefits for corporate users. The LED backlighting of the E223W allows for a slimmer profile, lighter weight and increased power savings compared to previous generation models. It offers touch-sensitive controls that are integrated into the bezel, making display adjustments easier and more intuitive than ever. A comprehensive input panel, including DisplayPort, DVI-D and VGA, connects users to the latest peripherals and future-proofs the investment.
